meanings.definition: The position or office of a dean.
meanings.sent1: The deanship at the university involves overseeing various departments.
meanings.sent2: She was honored to be appointed to the deanship of the medical school.
meanings.sent3: The deanship of the school of business requires a good sense of organization.
meanings.sent4: His deanship in the faculty was like being the captain of a ship.
meanings.sent5: The deanship of the law school is a prestigious role.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a dean.
meanings.sent1: During his deanship, many positive changes were implemented.
meanings.sent2: The deanship of the college lasts for five years.
meanings.sent3: The deanship of the music department is like a musical conductor.
meanings.sent4: Her deanship was marked by a focus on student success.
meanings.sent5: The deanship of the engineering school requires strong leadership skills.
